project_preview_description.text: A two player card game app that allows players to create multiple active games and play against other players

project_description.text: Developed within 5 days for the Lighthouse Labs Midterm group project, Goofspiel is a two player card game app that allows players to create multiple active games and play against other players.
Built with HTML, SCSS, JQuery, Bootstrap, AJAX, Express, PostgreSQL, Socket.io and Knex.js

siteMetadata.title: Jerry Chuang's Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: A portfolio powered by Gatsby and Prismic to showcase portfolios and blogs.
